description:
In the first half, Gintoki decides that as protagonist, he can`t sit and do nothing as a Gintama game is released. He takes matters into his own hands as Odd Jobs looks to produce a superhit. In the second, Shinpachi buys a new pair of glasses that get him rather high spirits...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kami Gee to Kuso Gee wa Kamihitoe / Megane wa Tamashii no Ichibu
Les jeux légendaires et les jeux merdiques diffèrent à peine
The Line Between Godlike Games and Shitty Games Is Paper-Thin / Glasses Are a Part of the Soul
神ゲーと糞ゲーは紙一重 / メガネは魂の一部
